subject: p15204620
History: Non-small cell lung cancer, increasing respiratory distress.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Extensive mediastinal right-sided adenopathy with potential volume loss in the right upper lobe. Extensive consolidation at the right lung base. No newly appeared focal parenchymal opacities. No change in size and aspect of the cardiac silhouette. No pleural effusions.
